ComicInfo.Title: The Space Between Us
ComicInfo.Summary: Sara Pezzini thought she had reached an understanding with Chicago P.D.'s Jane 'Big Woz' Wosnicki, but clearly she was mistaken. In order to protect her secret life, Pezzini will agree to help solve a personal problem for Woz, which will inadvertently lead her to discover another aspect of Chicago's supernaturally corrupt nature.
ComicInfo.CoverArtist: Arif Prianto,Diego Bernard,Fred Benes,John Tyler Christopher
